title: Howard Stern - October 27, 2014 [ALL-VERSIONS]
description:
Howard Stern - October 27, 2014

* Remembering Jack Bruce. 6:00am
* Beth's Phone Stolen. 6:15am
* News Stories, Movie Reviews And More. 6:20am
* Aaron Lewis' Screw Up, Top 5 Songs And More. 6:45am
* Kittens, Phone Calls and More. 6:55am
* Halloween Discussions With Richard Christy. 7:05am
* Howard Takes Some Calls. 7:25am
* Howard Plays Some Audio Clips. 7:30am
* Amy Poehler Visits. 7:50am
* Mike And Brandy Sit In For The News. 9:35am
* Robin's News. 9:45am
* Wrap Up Show - Amy Poehler. 10:40am
* Wrap Up Show - Halloween And Richard. 10:55am
* Wrap Up Show - Jack Bruce. 11:15am

This includes an audio edit using @SternGeek's source.

1) This audio has been dyson compressed at 80% and amplified for maximum range.
Talk Radio & Podcasts sound much better, especially thru earbuds, with this edit.
You will also find it easier to hear audio details in loud environments.
If you have good speakers, or listen in a quite environment, you don't need this.

2) This encode will also use much less power from your batteries.

3) I have been experimenting lately with mixing in a small amount of white noise
in the final rendering to get rid of those awkward silences that the MP3 format
sometimes creates when there's not enough volume to compress.

4) I now include any Instagram pics/vids mentioned during the show.
